mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( 'ORD', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), LPAD(IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(ordr_no, 12) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 3, '0') ) FROM orders WHERE ordr_no LIKE CONCAT('ORD', DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '%')
SELECT ordr_no FROM orders WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY ordr_dt DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT o.ordr_no AS orderId, -- 주문번호 o.last_stlm_amt AS totalAmount, -- 최종 결제 금액 o.ordr_dt AS approvedAt, -- 주문일시를 결제 승인일시로 사용 o.rcvr_nm AS rcvrNm, -- 수령인 이름 o.dlvy_addr AS dlvyAddr, -- 배송 주소 o.dlvy_daddr AS dlvyDaddr, -- 배송 상세 주소 o.zip AS zip, -- 우편번호 o.rcvr_telno AS rcvrTelno, -- 수령인 연락처 o.user_name AS userName, -- 주문자 이름 (수령인과 다를 수 있음) o.dlvy_memo_cn AS dlvyMemoCn, -- 배송 메모 o.gds_tot_amt AS gdsTotAmt, -- 상품 총액 (할인 전) o.dlvy_fee_amt AS dlvyFeeAmt, -- 배송비 o.apld_cpn_dscnt_amt AS apldCpnDscntAmt, -- 쿠폰 할인 금액 u.eml_addr AS userEmail, -- 주문자 이메일 (users 테이블에서 JOIN) FROM orders o INNER JOIN users u ON o.user_no = u.user_no WHERE o.ordr_no = #{orderId}

SELECT p.gds_nm AS name, -- 상품명 oi.ordr_qntty AS quantity, -- 주문 수량 oi.ordr_tm_untprc AS price, -- 주문 시점 단가 (oi.ordr_qntty * oi.ordr_tm_untprc) AS total -- 항목별 총액 FROM order_items oi INNER JOIN products p ON oi.gds_no = p.gds_no -- products 테이블의 상품명(gds_nm)을 가져오기 위한 JOIN WHERE oi.ordr_no = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shipments (dlvy_no, ordr_no, stlm_id, dlvy_co_nm, waybil_no, dlvy_stts_cd, sndng_dt, dlvy_cmptn_dt, dlvy_info_crt_dt, dlvy_info_mdfcn_dt) VALUES (#{dlvyNo}, #{ordrNo}, #{stlmId}, #{dlvyCoNm}, #{waybilNo}, #{dlvySttsCd}, #{sndngDt}, #{dlvyCmptnDt}, #{dlvyInfoCrtDt}, #{dlvyInfoMdfcnDt})
mapper.select: SELECT dlvy_no, ordr_no, stlm_id, dlvy_co_nm, waybil_no, dlvy_stts_cd, sndng_dt, dlvy_cmptn_dt, dlvy_info_crt_dt, dlvy_info_mdfcn_dt FROM shipments
SELECT dlvy_no, ordr_no, stlm_id, dlvy_co_nm, waybil_no, dlvy_stts_cd, sndng_dt, dlvy_cmptn_dt, dlvy_info_crt_dt, dlvy_info_mdfcn_dt FROM shipments WHERE dlvy_no = #{dlvyNo}
SELECT dlvy_no, ordr_no, stlm_id, dlvy_co_nm, waybil_no, dlvy_stts_cd, sndng_dt, dlvy_cmptn_dt, dlvy_info_crt_dt, dlvy_info_mdfcn_dt FROM shipments WHERE waybil_no = #{waybilNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE shipments SET ordr_no = #{ordrNo}, stlm_id = #{stlmId}, dlvy_co_nm = #{dlvyCoNm}, waybil_no = #{waybilNo}, dlvy_stts_cd = #{dlvySttsCd}, sndng_dt = #{sndngDt}, dlvy_cmptn_dt = #{dlvyCmptnDt}, dlvy_info_mdfcn_dt = NOW() WHERE dlvy_no = #{dlvyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(dlvy_no) = 0 THEN 'dlvy_00001' ELSE CONCAT('dlvy_', LPAD(CAST(SUBSTRING(MAX(dlvy_no), 6) AS UNSIGNED) + 1, 5, '0')) END FROM shipments WHERE dlvy_no LIKE 'dlvy_%'
